Firestone.NAME: Firestone
DESCRIPTION: At the end of turn, deal #b{Pot} damage to a random enemy.

Protectio.NAME: Protectio
DESCRIPTION: At the end of turn, gain #b{Pot} #yBlock.

Incendium.NAME: Incendium
DESCRIPTION: At the end of turn, deal #b{Pot} damage to ALL enemies.

Reservo.NAME: Reservo
DESCRIPTION: At the end of turn, #yRetain up to #b1 card. NL #yBreak: #yRetain up to #b2 cards.
At the end of turn, #yRetain up to #b2 cards. NL #yBreak: #yRetain up to #b4 cards.

Spiculum.NAME: Spiculum
DESCRIPTION: Gain #b{Pot} #yThorns. NL #yBreak: Gain another #b{Pot} #yThorns then lose twice that at the end of turn.

Potentia.NAME: Potentia
DESCRIPTION: Gain #b{Pot} #yPotency. NL #yBreak: Gain another #b{Pot} #yPotency then lose twice that at the end of turn.

Prismatica.NAME: Prismatica
DESCRIPTION: At the start of turn, add a random card into your hand. It costs #b0 for the turn.
At the start of turn, add a random #yUpgraded cardinto your hand. It costs #b0 for the turn.

Industria.NAME: Industria
DESCRIPTION: At the start of turn, gain [E] .
At the start of turn, gain [E] and draw #b1 card.

Medicinae.NAME: Medicinae
DESCRIPTION: At the end of combat, heals #b{Pot2} HP. NL #yBreak: Heals #b{Pot} HP.

Magma.NAME: Magma
DESCRIPTION: At the end of turn, deal #b{Pot} damage and gain #b{Pot2} #yBlock.

Obretio.NAME: Obretio
DESCRIPTION: At the end of turn, enemy with highest attack intent loses #b{Pot} #yStrength this turn.

Vitae.NAME: Vitae
DESCRIPTION: Lose #yPotency of this rune instead of HP. NL #yBreak: Gain #b{Pot} #yBlock twice.
